<style>
/* Container to hold both images in the same place */
.avatar-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 280px;   /* same width as your avatar */
  height: 350px;  /* same height as your avatar (vertical oval) */
  margin: 0 auto; /* center horizontally */
  border-radius: 50%; /* vertical oval clipping */
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* Base image */
.avatar-container img.base-avatar {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover; /* maintain aspect ratio and fill container */
  transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
}

/* Hover image */
.avatar-container img.hover-avatar {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  opacity: 0; /* hidden by default */
  transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
}

/* Show hover image on hover */
.avatar-container:hover img.hover-avatar {
  opacity: 1;
}
.avatar-container:hover img.base-avatar {
  opacity: 0;
}
</style>

<div class="avatar-container">
  <img src="images/avatar.jpg" alt="Profile Photo" class="base-avatar">
  <img src="images/avatar_hover.jpg" alt="Profile Photo Hover" class="hover-avatar">
</div>

### Postdoctoral Researcher
#### Quantitative Ecology & Community Resilience
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am a global change ecologist currently applying quantitative tools to better understand the impacts of climate change and human action on marine and terrestrial ecosystems. I am currently working with the Northwest Fisheries Science Center and Occidental College and based in Los Angeles, California.
